title: Olaf just got picked by MYM in the LCS
body: Pretty excited to actually see him come back into competitive, waiting to see how he does.

replies.body: Welp, Olaf couldn't carry once Jax and LeBlanc got fed...
I think olaf was a bad choice for the match tbh. His ganks aren't really that great, and giants took advantage of that with the elise. Mimer, I just don't know what he was thinking.

Well, I just watched the post game recap, and most everyone talking kept referencing how Riot's attempts to balance Renekton away from being a super bully into having a better late game too made it so he couldn't actually bully the Jax like he thought he could have, which meant Jax could free farm until Pepiinero could kill him, and then they snowballed off of that.
Renekton you say? Olaf is not pleased to be mistaken as a Croc.
No, he is not pleased that his top laner fed Jax and Leblanc. Olaf was jungle.
Another Olaf on Fanatics team against H2K. Take two.
Whoever reworked olaf clearly didn't understand the game well. I hope he isn't part of the current balance team..
Olaf just isn't OP enough to become meta.  I mean, a weak slow on his Q and no movement speed steroids?  He's going to get creamed in the mobility meta.
